Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the frog skin active peptide family (Brevinin subfamily)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.22450466]Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus ATCC2592 (MIC=37.5 µM), Staphylococcus carnosus KHS (MIC=37.5 µM), Bacillus licheniformis X39 (MIC=19 µM), Rhodococcus rhodochrous X15 (MIC=4.8 µM);Gram-negative bacteria:Psychrobacter faecalis X29 (MIC=75 µM);Fungi:Slime mould 090223 (MIC=19 µM), Candida albicans ATCC2002 (MIC=75 µM).
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Predicted Structure: There is no predicted structure for DRAMP01787.
Sequence Information.Function: Has hemolytic activity against washed human erythrocytes (IC50=75 µM).

Literature.Title: Novel antimicrobial peptides isolated from the skin secretions of Hainan odorous frog, Odorrana hainanensis.
Literature.Author: Wang H, Yu Z, Hu Y, Li F, Liu L, Zheng H, Meng H, Yang S, Yang X, Liu J.
